group_1.textRight: Mifuyu...was a crybaby...?
And Yachiyo...@She was pretty childish too...

group_1.textLeft: They've grown a lot from that time.

group_1.textRight: Hm...

group_1.textLeft: Whenever I recount the story of that birthday party,
Yachiyo and her friends ask me to stop since it's embarrassing for them.
But I talk about it anyway because it's a precious memory to me.

group_1.textRight: ...I don't think it's...embarrassing...
I'm glad...you told me...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much.@It makes me happy to hear you say that.

group_1.textRight: For a long, long time... Yachiyo and Mifuyu@have always been the same...
They're both...so diligent...and so selfless...

group_1.textLeft: The two of them are such hard workers.

group_1.textRight: Hm...
Whenever I'm with them...@I feel...a little bit braver too....

group_1.textLeft: There used to be another girl who'd say the same thing...
This is also a pretty old story...

group_1.narration: When I was still boarding university students at Mikazuki Villa,@Yachiyo and Mifuyu were spoiled by all the older girls.
There was one girl who acted like their big sister@and spoiled them more than anyone.@She liked to help Yachiyo and Mifuyu with their studies.
But after a certain time,@that girl seemed to block herself off from them...
The girls were very upset@and tried their best to fix whatever was worrying her.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:110203:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Here you go!
Today's side dish is shredded chicken and@cucumber with plum seasoning.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see...@Thank you.

group_1.textLeft: Big sis, aren't you happy...?
This is...our favorite side dish...
Yachiyo worked hard to make it today.

group_1.textRight: Huh, is that so?@[chara:800102:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800102:cheek_0][chara:800102:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:800102:lipSynch_1]You're so amazing, Yachiyo-chan!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: You're becoming more like a big sister every day.

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm not a little kid anymore.

group_1.textRight: My bad, my bad!
Then, it's time to dig in!
Ahhh...
[chara:800102:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]...yep, crisp, sour, and delicious!

group_1.textLeft: How do you feel?  Refreshed?

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: Don't you like this dish because it's sour and refreshing?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I think I've said something along those lines...

group_1.textLeft: Big sis, you've seemed kind of out of it lately.
I talked it over with Mifuyu...
She thought eating your favorite might@cheer you up a little.

group_1.textRight: ...Thank you! I love you sooo much, Yachiyo-chan~~!

group_1.textLeft: Wha?!@That's so embarrassing...!

group_1.textRight: However, I need to be the one to pull myself@out of this daze.

group_1.textLeft: Really...?@I wish there was something I could do to help...

group_1.textRight: Your feelings...that is...@They make me very happy...
Hmm...ah, what the heck...

group_1.textLeft: Come on, let's talk about it.

group_1.textRight: ...You see, I met someone... who feels like he means@the whole world to me...

group_1.textLeft: ...The whole world?
In other words... @You love this person?

group_1.textRight: Huh, I guess you could say that...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:110203:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha-wha-what!?

group_1.textRight: You don't have to act so surprised...

group_1.textLeft: Ah...I'm sorry for overreacting.
But I'll do my best to support you if you're@having those sorts of feelings!
This time, it's my turn to help you out,@just like you've always done for me!
